name: Hisshou 777 Fighter II: Pachi-Slot Hi Jouhou
overview: Hisshou 777 Fighter 2: Pachi-Slot Hi Jouhou ("Winning 777 Fighter 2: Pachi-Slot Confidential") is a pachi-slots game for the Super Famicom. It is the second game in the Hisshou 777 Fighter series. Once again, the player must earn cash by playing the slots over and over. The game uses spy/detective genre fiction for its story, similar to Pachinko Wars.
